items.value: Warden
A heavily armored guardian capable of surviving even the most grievous injuries.
Juggernaut
Draws 4 cards and heals 2 HP each turn.
Infernal Contract
One Use. Exile all skills, then delve 5. Lower max HP by 4.
Assault
Critical Strike. Deal 2 damage. Draw 1 more card next turn.
Bonus Feats
One Use. Gain a copy of each non-heroic skill.
Training
One Use. Lose 5 HP. Raise max HP by 1.
Butchery
Deal 1 damage to all enemies. If your deck has 30+ cards, deal 3 damage.
Grit
Permanent. Unplayable. Reserve. When facing 2+ enemies at end of turn, heal 1 HP.
Defensive Stance
Reduce the attack of all creatures by 1. Gain a shield. Draw one less card next turn.
Overwhelm
For every copy in your deck, draw a card and lose 1 HP.
Smash
Deal 3 damage. Deal 1 damage per 10 cards in your deck to a random target.
